languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} заставляет союзника действовать на пределе возможностей, повышая его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} на +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} на 1 раунд. Кроме того, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} офицера можно применять к цели Приказа командира на любом расстоянии. Персонаж, к которому применен Приказ командира, не может стать целью этой способности в течение 2 следующих {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

Кроме того, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} офицера можно применять к цели Приказа командира на любом расстоянии. Персонаж, к которому применен Приказ командира, не может стать целью этой способности в течение 2 следующих {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text: 军官强迫一名盟友{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}{/g}全力作战，使其所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 此外，军官所有{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以直接对受指挥之声影响的盟友释放，无视距离。 受指挥之声影响的盟友，在接下来的两轮内无法再次成为此能力的目标。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} bringt einen Verbündeten dazu, sich {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}ins Zeug zu legen{/g}, wodurch seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} erhöht werden. Ferner können alle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offiziers aus beliebiger Distanz auf das Ziel von Stimme des Kommandos angewendet werden. Ein Charakter, der mit Stimme des Kommandos belegt wird, kann in den nächsten 2 Runden nicht mehr mit dieser Fähigkeit anvisiert werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} oblige un allié à se {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}surpasser{/g}, augmentant ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. De plus, toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'officier peuvent être appliquées à la cible de Voix du commandement, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare. Un personnage visé par Voix du commandement ne peut plus être la cible de cette capacité pendant les 2 rounds suivants.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は味方に全力戦闘を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}強制{/g}し、それらの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}する。 さらに、指揮の声のターゲットには、オフィサーのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がどこからでも適用できるようになる。 指揮の声のターゲットになったキャラクターは、以降2ラウンドの間、再度アビリティのターゲットにはできない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} forces an ally to fully {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} themselves, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance. A character who becomes the target of Voice of Command cannot be targeted by this ability again for the next 2 rounds.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birime sınırlarını zorlatarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} onun {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} +{uip|BonusStats|9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad} kadar artırır. Subay, buna ek olarak tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} Emir Sözü'nün hedefine herhangi bir mesafeden uygulayabilir. Emir Sözü kabiliyetinin hedefi olan bir karakter, ilerideki 2 raunt boyunca tekrar bu kabiliyetin hedefi olamaz.

Additionally, all of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can be applied to the target of Voice of Command from any distance.
